mapper.select: select count(*) from member_tbl where member_email = #{memberEmail}
select count(*) from member_tbl where member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: insert into coupon_box_tbl values(coupon_box_seq.nextval, 1, (select member_no from member_tbl where member_id=#{memberId}), 'n', to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD'), to_char(sysdate+365,'YYYY-MM-DD'))
mapper.select: select member_id from member_tbl where member_name = #{memberName} and member_email=#{memberEmail}
select count(*) from member_tbl where member_name = #{memberName} and member_id = #{memberId} and member_email=#{memberEmail}
select count(*) as coupon_no from coupon_box_tbl where member_no=#{memberNo} and use_status='n'
select count(*) from book_tbl b join book_seat_tbl s on(s.book_no = b.book_no) join pay_tbl p on (s.book_seat_no = p.book_detail_no) where b.member_no = #{memberNo}

select c.coupon_name, c.coupon_disscount, b.coupon_box_issue_dt, b.coupon_box_expire_dt from coupon_tbl c join coupon_box_tbl b on (b.coupon_no = c.coupon_no) join member_tbl m on (m.member_no= b.member_no) where member_id=#{memberId} and use_status='n' order by coupon_box_issue_dt asc
